title: FED by Water
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Catering
description: Switched to all-veg in May 2016, FED by Water is a new concept restaurant offering authentic traditional Italian cuisine with the objective of bringing the nutritional importance of pure water to the public conscience. It promotes a new alkaline Mediterranean diet that encourages healthy living while also appealing to the most discerning foodies. The extensive menu covers all kind of requests even if the key focus is on vegan and vegetarian dishes. Located across from Dalston Kingsland station.
